summary: 该接口用于将RDS实例移动到指定资源组。

schema.description: 用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。由客户端生成该参数值，要保证在不同请求间唯一，最大值不超过64个ASCII字符，且该参数值中不能包含非ASCII字符。

400.errorMessage: The Specified resource group id is not found.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

title: 修改实例资源组
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
- RDS SQL Server
- RDS MariaDB
